demons.name: Demons
demons.description: Demons show up in the garage.

cp.name: Creator Points
cp.description: Creator Points show up in the garage. Click the CP icon to refresh.

no-lock-hint.name: Remove Lock Hint
no-lock-hint.description: Removes the "Tap lock icon for more info!" text.

top-buttons.name: Mod Options
top-buttons.description: Adds a top bar of buttons (requires Remove Lock Hint setting enabled)

advanced-stats.name: Advanced Stats
advanced-stats.description: Displays advenced stats when clicking icons such as demons and stars (like when you open your profile and click them.)

issues.info: Report issues to OmgRod on GitHub and they may be fixed in a future release.
